gift_source:
::MATCH1::
Match the descriptor to type.
{
= SIFT -> Floating-point, distinctive
= SURF -> Faster, approximate SIFT
= ORB -> Binary, real-time
= BRIEF -> Simple binary tests
}
title: MATCH1
question: Match the descriptor to type.

gift_source:

Match the descriptor to property.
{
= FREAK -> Binary, inspired by retina
= BRIEF -> Binary, random intensity tests
= ORB -> FAST + BRIEF combination
= SIFT -> Gradient histograms
}

question: Match the descriptor to property.
